personalInfo.name: Minh Thien Pham
personalInfo.title: Computer Science Student
personalInfo.bio: I'm a Computer Science student at the University of Central Florida, interested in backend web APIs, systems programming, and security. I like building things that are practical, well-structured, and secure enough to survive real users.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: Freelance Software Engineer
experience.company: Nail Bar & Spa of Saint Cloud
description: Engineered a local-first POS (Electron/React/TypeScript + SQLite) handling ~700 transactions/month and eliminating owner’s manual payroll math through automated payroll calculations.
Published 2 customer-facing web surfaces: a cloud-hosted promotional site and a LAN-based PWA for in-salon loyalty tracking and QR-enabled gift card workflows.
Established staff workflows (clock-in/out, turn/bonus/appointment queues) with role-based 4-digit PIN access (Owner/Receptionist/Tech), supporting ~20 active staff.
Architected conflict-detection UI to record multi-tech split payments, promo/reward application, and dynamic tip distribution, reducing queue discrepancy issues during high-volume periods.

projects.title: Unix-like Shell
projects.subtitle: C
description: Programmed a Unix-like shell in C featuring an interactive REPL, native commands (cd/pwd/echo/type/history/exit), PATH resolution, and process execution.
Integrated pipelines (multi-command), 4 redirection modes (stdout/stderr overwrite + append), 3 quoting/escaping rules, and persistent history.

projects.title: PL/0 Compiler & PM/0 Virtual Machine
projects.subtitle: C
description: Constructed an end-to-end PL/0 toolchain in C (hand-written lexer/recursive-descent parser/code generator/PM/0 stack VM) to compile source programs into bytecode.
Designed lexical scoping and control flow with JPC/JMP backpatching, targeting a 9-opcode PM/0 VM.
Implemented a PM/0 virtual machine with PC/BP/SP registers and instruction tracing.

projects.title: GrubGo
projects.subtitle: Node.js / Express / MongoDB / JWT
description: Co-developed a full-stack restaurant ordering app in a 4-person team.
Delivered backend endpoints for registration/login with JWT, role-based admin access control, and cart/order workflows.
Designed MongoDB collections and validation for users, carts, and orders.

projects.title: Contact Manager
projects.subtitle: PHP / LAMP / Swagger
description: Authored authentication and contact CRUD REST endpoints for a PHP/MySQL contact manager web app.
Led a v2 refactor to centralize DB configurations and standardize JSON responses, documenting endpoints via Swagger.

certifications.name: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2025 AI Foundations Associate
